title: Grigori's Art (Or Actually Photo Edits) Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:magnus-web-format]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**[[[grigori-karpin-s-author-page | More by this author]]]**

[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[div style="border: solid 5px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; background: #E5E5E2; margin: auto; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
Right, so I guess I have a decent amount of photo edits from SCP articles that I am proud of, and I thought I would show them all off on one page.
[[=]]

++ __Photo Edits__
